description:
Glorify: Your Daily Christian App for Devotional and Prayer. Grow with God. Every day.

Over 20 million Christians have already enriched their faith journeys with Glorify. Join them! Download Glorify today. 

Start your quiet time with an inspiring quote, followed by a Bible passage and a devotional that ties everything together. Wrap up with an immersive Daily Walk with God, a virtual walk meditating on God’s Word.

Feeling busy? We get it. Glorify helps you connect with God in just 10 minutes, fitting into your daily routine.

Build a deeper connection with God every day through daily devotionals, guided Christian meditation, and prayer.

Plus, all the tools you need to strengthen your relationship with God:

• Grow with your faith community: 

Connect with friends, family, and church communities. Discuss devotionals, share prayer requests, and support each other.

• Sleep and Calming Meditations: 

Relax and focus on God with scripture-based meditations that draw you into a peaceful space.

• Transformational Christian Courses: 

Explore courses designed to deepen your understanding of the Bible and your faith.

• Powerful Declarations: 

Speak life over your circumstances with biblically-based declarations.

• Official Bible Translations:

 Access multiple Bible translations, including the King James Version (KJV).

• Bible Journal and Worship Music: 

Document your spiritual journey and enjoy your favorite worship music.

• Grow closer to God and connect with others in prayer. 

You may purchase an auto-renewing subscription through an In-App Purchase.

• Auto-renewable subscription

• $6.99 / month

• Your subscription will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew (at the duration selected) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24    hours before the end of the current period.

• Current subscription may not be canceled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your iTunes Account Settings after purchase

Terms & Conditions: https://glorify-app.com/terms-conditions/ 

Privacy Policy: https://glorify-app.com/privacy-policy/

Bible Chat: Built for Christians Who Want to Hear God in the Noise of Everyday Life

Have you made time for God’s Word today? Join millions of believers who’ve chosen the #1 faith app in the world. Download Bible Chat today!

Life is noisy. Fast. Overwhelming. Even when you’re trying to stay close to God, it’s easy to feel spiritually disconnected.

Bible Chat is the ultimate all-in-one Christian app designed to make Bible reading, prayer, and Christian community a part of your everyday life. It is for Christians who want peace - real peace - anchored in Scripture.


Whether you're a lifelong Christian or just starting your journey, Bible Chat gives you everything you need to:

• Understand the Bible Better - Learn what the Bible really means with helpful guides and simple explanations that make God's Word easier to follow and apply.

• Grow Your Prayer Habit - Build a consistent prayer routine supported by daily  inspiration and the power of a praying community.

• Make Faith Part of Your Day - Improve your daily routine with spiritual prompts, Christian calendar reminders, and faith tools designed for the whole family.

• Support Your Mental Health - Find peace and calm in moments of stress with simple tools that help you refocus on God’s strength.

• Make Faith Fun and Interactive - Enjoy fun and easy ways to learn, think, and talk about how faith fits into your everyday life.


Key Features to Explore:

• Daily Plan: Stay on track with your faith. Follow a simple daily plan that helps you grow closer to God, one step at a time.

• Structured Bible Study Plans: Follow simple Bible reading plans made for real life. Some of the topics include: healing, wisdom, leadership, grief, and more.

•  Holy Calendar: See important Christian days in a monthly view. Never miss a feast, saint day, or holy event again.

• Panic Button: Struggling with stress or temptation? Tap the Panic Button for guided deep breathing exercises that calm the mind and provide anxiety relief.

• Live Prayer: Share your prayer intentions, and let's pray together to grow closer to God.

• Send a Blessing:  Send a Bible verse with a kind message straight to a friend’s phone. Add a heart or doodle to make it personal and uplifting.

• Bible Stories for Kids: Turn screen time into faith time! Show fun, Bible-based stories and videos to your kids.

• Multiple Bible Versions: Read the Bible the way you like best. Choose from NKJV, KJV, WMB, FBV, World English Bible, Amplified, and NASB.

• Bible Verse Widget: See a new Bible verse every day, right on your lock screen or home screen.

• Bible Trivia: Challenge and enhance your biblical knowledge through interactive trivia games.

• Verse Locator: Looking for a verse? Search and find it fast, along with what it means.

• Personalized Devotionals & Prayers: Start your day with custom devotionals and write your own prayers to stay closer to God.

• Biblical Character Profiles: Learn about the people in the Bible: their stories, struggles, and how God worked in their lives.

• Let's Discuss Faith: Join honest chats about how faith connects to your real life - like work, family, and relationships.


Experience More with Premium:
Unlock unlimited conversations, full access to every feature, and exclusive designs for your Daily Prayer Widgets. Start with a FREE 7-day trial, then choose our weekly plan at £4.99 or opt for extended plans for greater savings.


Privacy Policy & Terms and Conditions:
https://thebiblechat.com/privacy-policy/
https://thebiblechat.com/terms-and-conditions/


Join Our Thriving Community:
Join a friendly community of people who love God or are just starting to learn. With Bible Chat and the new Send a Blessing Widget, you can make Bible verses and prayer part of your everyday conversations.

Get God’s Word for free on your devices with the Bible App by YouVersion. Connect with God through Scripture by reading, listening, Plans, Daily Refresh, Verse of the Day, and so much more!

Choose from 1,750+ languages and 2,500+ Bible versions. Make it your Bible by adding Friends, choosing Plans, creating Verse Images, highlighting, and making notes.

Bring your friends with you and explore the Bible together. Have honest conversations about Scripture. Grow together and share what you discover.

People are reading, listening to, watching, and sharing the free Bible App by YouVersion on over 500 million devices worldwide. Join the global Community today! Download the Bible App.


EXPLORE GOD’S WORD
* Choose from thousands of Bible versions in over 1,750 languages
* Pick from over 60 languages for your Bible App interface
* Download select Bible versions to access when you’re offline
* Listen to select Bible versions and enjoy skip, playback speed, and timer controls.
* Learn more about the Verse of the Day in Guided Scripture with an engaging video and personal reflection questions
* Tap through Scripture and prayer prompts in Guided Prayer, or write your own prayers using the Prayer feature
* Choose from thousands of Plans that focus on specific topics, portions of Scripture, or the entire Bible in a year
* Watch videos from Christian organizations such as Bible Project and The Chosen
* Search for what the Bible says about any topic you’re wondering about
* Tap on a verse to see your Notes and related content such as videos, Plans, and study notes

MAKE IT YOUR BIBLE
* Themes let you select a color palette for your entire Bible App experience
* Create and download Verse Images for any verse you’d like—it’s shareable art
* Highlight with custom colors and create notes
* Bookmark passages to share, memorize, and keep at the front of your mind
* Share verses with friends using social media, email, or text
* Add notes on any verse—make them private or let your Friends see them
* Access your account from any supported device
* Adjust lighting, font, font size, and line spacing for easy reading

BRING YOUR FRIENDS ALONG
* Center your friendships around Scripture by adding your Friends to the Bible App
* See an activity feed that shows what you and your Friends are noting, bookmarking, and highlighting
* Comment on the Verse of the Day with your Friends—ask questions and share how God is speaking to you
* Write your own prayers and share them with your Friends to pray together
* Do Plans together and discuss what you’re learning

CONNECT WITH YOUVERSION
* Contact Support from inside the Bible App
* Join the @youversion Community on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok & Pinterest
* Catch up on the latest at blog.youversion.com
* Access the Bible online at bible.com

Download the world’s #1 Bible App and enjoy the Bible experience loved by millions!

Translate between up to 249 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no Internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Dictation: Translate spoken words and phrases
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

Bible KJV - Daily Bible Verse is a free KJV Bible study tool that people read bible verse of the day, listen to the audio bible - the holy bible king james version, share and learn king james version bible. The holy bible king james version allows you to receive a daily bible verse to get closer to God and learn God’s word without internet access. Free beautiful daily bible verse of the day in KJV translation helps you to inspire your faith everyday. Bible KJV - Daily Bible Verse reminds you to talk with God everyday by reading the bible verse of the day and you are also allowed to create your own bible verse collection, audio bibles, and private notes.
 
THE GREAT FREE BIBLE STUDY TOOL
- Access King James Version Bible anytime anywhere by swiping screen corner
- Off to a good start with an inspiring Bible verse of the day 
- Easy verse copying and pasting
- Study KJV Bible Offline 
- Listen to audio Bibles offline
- Search the holy bible king james version with keywords
- Share the free Bible verses with your family and friends on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram
 
CUSTOMIZE YOUR OWN KJV BIBLE FOR FREE
- Bookmarks: Catch up where you left off with a simple bookmark.
- Highlights: Mark favorite verses in different colors and manage them in the highlight tab.
- Notes: Write down your own thoughts and share them with your friends.
- Font Adjustment: Choose any font sizes, colors, styles and line spacings you want.
- Share verses with your friends and family via multiple platforms with ease
 
King James Bible Subscription

- King James Bible now offers morning & evening audio devotionals, Bible quizzes, ads-free service and audio of the whole book for free.

- You can purchase a monthly subscription for $4.99 USD to remove ads to make your Bible journey simple and pure.

- It will be authorized by iTunes and added to your iTunes account after you subscribe.

- Subscription will be automatically renewed into the following month. If you want to cancel, simply turn off the default payment setting at least 24 hours before the end of the month.

- These paid services will not be available once you unsubscribe. Follow the instructions of iTunes: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039.

Terms of use: https://idailybread.org/tos.html
Privacy policy: https://idailybread.org/pp.html

KEEP IN TOUCH WITH KJV BIBLE APP
Send us Email: cs@idailybread.org
Visit our website: http: //www.idailybread.org
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KJVBibleStudyApp/

Bible KJV - Daily Bible Verse, Holy Bible App keeps God’s teaching at your fingertips. A free pocket bible, a KJV bible on the go. King James Bible App helps you learn God’s Word anytime, anywhere you want. Now get started on this exciting journey and spend time with God! 
This Application is not related to, offered by, or sponsored by the YouVersion Application or Life Church.

LENS AI – AI Scanner & Identifier - IDENTIFY EVERYTHING!

Find people faster with DeepSearch, search across apps and platforms using just a photo!

Identify anything fast with AI! Scan and recognize Dog Breeds, Cats, Coins, Stones, Rocks, Plants, and Flowers with LENS AI.

AI Scanner for Everything!
Try LENS AI to quickly scan and identify objects around you. Just take a picture or show it to your camera, and let Lens AI do it for you.

Animal & Pet Identifier
Identify animals, pets like cats, dogs, dog breeds. If it’s a dog, cat, or any other pet, LENS AI helps you recognize breeds accurately. Want to learn more about your pets breed, history, or characteristics? LENS AI gives you fast details. Scan animals or unknown pets and get valuable insights with Lens AI Scanner & Identifier.

Dog & Cat Breed Identifier
Not sure what breed your pet is? LENS AI identify your Dog or Cat breeds accurately. Discover facts about your pet’s breed and characteristics with Lens AI. Great for pet lovers identify and learn about different dog and cat breeds. LENS AI helps shelters, pet owners, and animal lovers quickly recognize and understand different pet breeds.

Coin & Stone Scanner
Find out the history and value of coins. Scan stones and rocks to discover their type. Easy Scan & identify rare and valuable coins with Lens AI recognition. Explore different types of stones and rocks with fast AI scan.

Plant & Flower Identifier
Identify plants and flowers. Get fast details with Lens AI recognition. Learn plant names, care advice, and growing conditions with a simple scan and identification. Perfect for nature lovers, scan flowers and plants wherever you are!

Fast & High Accuracy AI Recognition
LENS AI provides real time results with its AI Scan & Identify tech.
As easy as scan and get precise identification in seconds, get results. A powerful AI app for researchers, students, nature lovers, pet lovers, and everyday users who want to learn more and curious about.

How It Works:
1. Open LENS AI and point your camera or just take a simple image.
2. Scan any object – Dog, Cat, Coin, Stone, Rock, Plant, or Flower.
3. Get fast and easy AI Lens Scan identification.

Download LENS AI Now!
Use the best AI scanner & Identifier for fast and high accuracy identification.

Voice translation was never so easy! Travel around the world and easily communicate in any country – Voice Translator will instantly pronounce translated phrases on-the-fly! Can’t read the menu items in a fancy foreign restaurant? Those days are history now with instant camera translation!

Communicate freely at the airport, hotel, gas station, supermarket or any other place. Read street signs in a foreign country, translate manuals of your overseas purchases or the text of any picture you already have in your phone. Just put your personal interpreter into a pocket and use it for your all translating needs!

Voice Translator is an essential learning tool for kids and adults – learn new phrases and listen to the correct pronunciation.

Start using Voice Translator now and forget about looking for the correct phrase in the dictionary – say any phrase and your interpreter will pronounce the translation out loud!

Features:
– Immediate translation of real-time conversations
– Use your camera for instant text translation
– Translate texts from your photos and pics
– Translate as you type in any of your favorite messaging apps
– Extended offline phrasebook
– Language detection for text-to-text mode
– 100+ languages working in speech-to-speech and text-to-text modes
– You can either speak or type to translate your text
– Smart text-to-text mode
– Speed up your text input with typing hints
– Convert text from languages with non-Latin alphabet
– Copy, paste and share translations in a single tap
– Intuitive dialogue conversation interface
– Speak the translated phrase out loud
– Control the speed of voice
– Male and female voices available
– Human-to-Pet and Pet-to-Human modes (for entertainment purposes only). Translate your pet’s meow or woof into your language.

"Pray Daily" is your invitation to a deeper, more meaningful relationship with the Divine. Immerse yourself in a spiritual haven, where every tap, every scroll, every interaction brings you one step closer to the heart of God. Designed for the devoted soul, this app seamlessly combines time-tested scriptures with modern functionalities to guide, inspire, and enlighten.

Deepen Your Connection Through Prayer
Harness the profound power of prayer. With "Pray Daily," every morning ushers in hope, and every night brings solace. Our extensive database of verses ensures that your conversations with God are always heartfelt and sincere, allowing you to express your most profound feelings, aspirations, and desires with ease.

Elevate Your Scripture Reading Experience
"Pray Daily" has been built to enhance your scripture reading. Revel in the divine teachings, customize your reading experience, and let the words of the Lord resonate. From adding notes to highlighting significant passages, and from listening to calming Bible audios during daily commutes to having His word guide you even without an internet connection, the scriptures have never been this accessible.

AI Priest - The Fusion of Faith & Technology
In moments of doubt, introspection, or simply seeking understanding, turn to our advanced AI Priest. This modern marvel, powered by cutting-edge technology and infused with biblical wisdom, stands ready to assist, advise, and guide you in all spiritual matters.

Challenge and Relax with Bible Trivia
Add a dose of fun to your spiritual journey. Dive into our extensive collection of Bible trivia, quizzes, and challenges. Perfect for both ardent Bible scholars and those seeking a relaxed yet enlightening activity. Every quiz brings a new opportunity to learn, reflect, and grow.

Structured Spiritual Growth
Guidance is paramount in one's journey of faith. Our selection of Bible plans is curated to cater to diverse needs. Be it deepening understanding, seeking emotional healing, or simply walking a path of enlightenment, "Pray Daily" has a plan tailored just for you.

A Global Church Experience
Our interactive Bible games not only provide moments of relaxation but also reward you with captivating views of sacred sanctuaries from across the globe. Each jigsaw puzzle piece you collect unlocks a new perspective, a new beacon of faith.

Chronicle Every Step with God
Your spiritual journey is precious. With "Pray Daily," every insight, every revelation, and every heartfelt prayer is preserved, letting you revisit and reflect upon these cherished moments anytime.

Key Features:

A rich, immersive prayer platform for conversations with God.
Extensive personalization in scripture reading.
Instant guidance with the AI Priest feature.
Engaging Bible trivia to test and expand your knowledge.
Curated Bible study plans to guide your spiritual journey.
Unlock breathtaking visuals of churches worldwide.
Detailed logs and records of your spiritual milestones.

Join a global community of believers, deepening their faith, and drawing closer to God every day. Download "Pray Daily" now.

[Subscription]

Weekly VIP Membership offers weekly subscription for US$1.99, Monthly VIP Membership offers monthly subscription for US$4.99, and Yearly VIP Membership offers yearly subscription for US$29.99 with 3 days free trial, you can cancel the subscription before the free trial converted to the paid subscription, or you will be automatically renewed and charged every period. The price is shown in United States Dollar, actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence. You can cancel your subscriptions anytime by going to your account settings in App Store.

Write anything in seconds without struggling to come up with ideas or the perfect words!!

Powered by the cutting-edge GPT technology, AI Writer generates high-quality content that is tailored to your needs in just seconds. Whether you need to craft a persuasive essay or a professional email, AI Writer has got you covered.

Key Features:
• Instant Content: Write anything in seconds, overcoming writer's block!
• Ready-to-Use Templates: Kickstart your writing journey effortlessly.
• Comprehensive Use Cases: Get inspired for any writing scenario.
• Multilingual Magic: Break language barriers with ease.
• Smart Q&A: Find answers to all your questions.
• Creativity Unleashed: Generate innovative ideas to make your writing shine.

Download now and unleash your full writing potential !

Unwind with narrated Quran stories in the Ayatique app. Play dozens of short inspiring stories from the Holy Quran to help you relax, sleep better, and find peace. Use immersive background sounds for a more soothing effect. End your day reflecting while studying Allah’s Word through audio.

- Library of most popular Quran stories
- Dozens of summarized Quran’s suras
- 6 immersive background sound effects
- Short audio clips (7 to 10 mins)
- Multiple audio story filters
- Beautifully narrated audio
- Handy minimized mode 
- Dark mode available 

▶ Perfect bedtime routine 

Take a moment to refresh your mind and pray for the day ahead. Whether you're feeling stressed, worried, tempted, or simply yearning for hope, listening to a Quran story could be the most comforting goodnight routine to help you sleep soundly. 

▶ Works for any mood or situation

Looking for peace of mind? Dealing with anxiety? Reflecting on your life? Ayatique might already have a narrated story for your current mood. With dozens of narrated stories in our library, you can strengthen your faith and learn a lesson today that might change your tomorrow. 

▶ Short Islamic stories for any age 

Ayatique has a separate section of summarized stories for kids to help toddlers learn the Holy Quran. Narrated storytelling along with background sound effects make it easier for children to grasp moral lessons at a young age. 

▶ Comforting background audio

Breathe life into narrated stories by adding a comforting background sound. Calming ocean waves, quiet drops of rain, gentle piano sounds, ambiently spinning vinyl, or whispers of bird chirping. Use them to create a completely immersive experience. 

▶ Peace of mind for a good sleep

Learn lessons from Islamic prophets before bedtime to get ready for the next day no matter what it holds. Play soothing and insightful Quran stories before bedtime and go to sleep feeling completely serene.

PAYMENT AND SUBSCRIPTION OPTIONS

Choose between the below to access the best Ayatique features:
• Monthly Subscription
• Annual Subscription

You may cancel your subscription at any time. To do so, visit your Apple account to manage your subscription and turn auto-renewal off. 

Support: support@ayatique.ai.

Privacy Policy - https://ayatique.ai/privacy-policy

Have the perfect Bible verses curated for you with Waves!
Looking for scriptures that speak directly to what is currently going on in your life? Waves is a curated Bible verse app that helps you grow spiritually by delivering handpicked verses tailored to the areas you want to improve. Whether you seek guidance, strength, peace, love, or wisdom, you’ll find verses that resonate with your personal journey.

Key Features:
Lock Screen & Home Screen Widgets – Stay connected to God’s Word with Bible verses that refresh every two hours, keeping inspiration just a glance away.
Customizable Reminders – Set up daily notifications to receive uplifting scripture as often as you need throughout your day.
AI-Powered Bible Chatbot – Get instant explanations of verses, devotionals, and personalized scripture recommendations based on what you're going through. You can also ask anything, and receive faith-based guidance!
Explore by Life Topics – Connect with scripture that aligns with your personal experiences. Whether you're facing challenges, seeking encouragement, or deepening your faith, find Bible verses that truly resonate.
Daily Spiritual Growth – Let God’s Word shape your life with carefully curated verses that inspire, motivate, and strengthen your faith.
Transform your spiritual journey today—download now and let the Bible speak directly to your heart!

Subscription prices and terms:
Go Premium for an elevated Waves: Bible Verse Experience with Waves Premium to unlock all topics and full access to Waves Chatbot. Start with a FREE 3-day trial, then you are billed $8.99 monthly after the trial. If you opt out of the free trial you are able to choose between the $8.99 monthly plan or $39.99 yearly plan at anytime! Subscription renews automatically every month for $8.99 unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Subscriptions can be managed in your App Store account settings!

Payment will be charged to the credit card connected to your Apple Account when you confirm the initial subscription purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be identified based on when you start your subscription for Waves Premium. You may manage your subscription and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to your Account Settings after the purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription, where applicable.

Read more about our terms and conditions here

Terms of Service: https://wavesbibleapp.notion.site/termsandconditions
Privacy Policy: https://wavesbibleapp.notion.site/privacypolicy

Bible Path is a thoughtfully designed app aimed at enriching your spiritual journey with scriptures that offer guidance and holy inspiration. Whether you seek daily inspiration, devotional reflections, or a deeper understanding of the scriptures, Bible Path provides a serene and supportive environment for personal growth.

Key Features:

Bible Chat:
Engage in conversations about faith, prayers, and scriptures with Bible Chat. This feature allows you to explore different interpretations of the scripture, ask questions, and connect with a community of fellow seekers in a holy atmosphere. The chat interface makes it easy to share your thoughts on scriptures and devotional topics with others.

Audio Bible:
Immerse yourself in the holy scriptures through our audio Bible. Perfect for quiet moments of reflection or during daily activities, the narrated scriptures help you stay connected to the Word of God. Whether you’re listening to audio prayers or meditating on the scripture, the app makes it easy to integrate devotional practices into your routine.

Inspirational Verses and Prayers:
Receive a daily dose of inspiration with verses and prayers that uplift and guide you. Each scripture verse and prayer is carefully chosen to offer spiritual nourishment, guiding you in your devotional journey with the holy scriptures.

Personalized Daily Reflections:
Reflect on personalized insights based on the holy scriptures and prayers that resonate with your spiritual needs. These reflections are crafted to help you ponder biblical themes and integrate their teachings into your daily life through consistent devotional practices.

Interactive Bible Studies:
Deepen your understanding of the Bible with our interactive study guides. These resources provide comprehensive insights and context, suitable for both personal study and group discussion, focusing on the holy scriptures to enrich your devotional life.

Faith Building Exercises and Prayers:
Engage in exercises designed to strengthen your faith and understanding, complemented by powerful prayers. These activities encourage you to reflect on scriptures and apply them to your life, guiding you in devotional practices.

Studies and Resources:
Access a wide range of study materials and resources tailored to different levels of biblical knowledge. description:
Yandex.Translate
Free translator that can work offline and translate text from photos

• Translate between any pair of the 100 languages when you’re online. 
• Translate from French, German, Italian, Russian, Spanish, Turkish and other languages to English while offline: download these languages for free and enable the offline mode in Settings.
• Speak words or phrases in Russian, English, or Turkish to translate them into any of these languages, or have the app read the translations to you.
• Learn new words and their meanings through usage examples in the app’s dictionary (available for most of the currently supported languages).
• Take a picture of a menu, road sign, book page or choose a photo with text from your Camera Roll to view its translation right over the image (only available when you are online).
• Translate entire sites directly in the app or in Safari.
• Read books, news, or articles in a foreign language together with Yandex.Translate on your iPad using Split View. 
• Read transliterated Arabic, Armenian, Farsi, Georgian, Greek, Hebrew, Korean, Japanese, or Chinese Pinyin.
• Enjoy the app’s time-saving predictive typing function and automated language detection.
• Save translations in Favorites and view your translation history at any time.
• Speak to your Apple Watch to see your words translated on its screen.

Currently supported languages: Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Basque, Bashkir, Belarussian, Bengali, Bulgarian, Burmese, Bosnian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chinese, Chuvash, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Elvish (Sindarin), English, Esperanto, Estonian, Farsi, Finnish, French, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hebrew, Hill Mari, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Korean, Kyrgyz, Latin, Latvian, Lao, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malagasy, Malaysian, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mari, Mongolian, Nepali, Norwegian, Papiamento, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Scots, Singhalese, Slovakian, Slovenian, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tagalog, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Udmurt, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Xhosa, Yakutian, Yiddish, Zulu.

Draw Closer to God in 4 Simple Steps — Start Your Day with Blessed
Looking for a simple, meaningful way to stay connected with God every day? Blessed is your spiritual companion — it guides you into a daily routine of prayer, Scripture, and community in just four simple steps. Whether you're starting your faith journey or seeking deeper connection with God, Blessed makes it easy and personal.

Your Path to Deeper Faith: The 4-Step Blessed Journey
Step 1: Recive Your Personalized Morning Blessing
Each morning, begin with a unique blessing tailored to how you're truly feeling. Whether you’re joyful, anxious, or overwhelmed, you'll receive a matching Bible verse and a prayer designed to speak directly to your heart. It's your immediate, personal connection with God's word, setting a Spirit-led tone for your day.

Step 2: Start Strong with Daily Verse
After your personalized blessing, dive into a Daily Verse and guided prayer to firmly establish your faith for the day. Want to reflect deeper? Share your thoughts in the comments or respond to others’ stories. Pray with brothers and sisters who understand — because faith grows best in a supportive community.

Step 3: End Your Day in Peace with Night Prayer
Before bed, end your day with peace. Receive a fresh evening Scripture and prayer prompt to quiet your mind, restore your heart, and remind you of God’s presence — even in the dark.

Step 4: Connect Through Live Streams
Can’t make it to church? No problem. Join our daily live streams where real pastors share encouragement, answer questions, and lead prayer. It’s like having a church in your pocket — anywhere, anytime.

More Ways Blessed Supports Your Faith
Bible Chat: Have questions about Scripture? Feeling unsure? Ask anything, anytime — and get a Biblical response. Like one user said, “It’s like having my own personal counselor in my pocket.”

Audio Bible: Listen to God’s Word wherever you go. Choose from NIV, KJV, and ESV translations. Play Bible stories, daily devotionals, and meditations to nourish your soul on the move.

Faithful Community: You're never alone. Share your prayer requests. Comment on verses. Celebrate victories with others walking the same road.

Stay On Track: Get daily reminders, track your prayer streak, and see your spiritual growth unfold. Add a beautiful Bible verse widget to your home screen to stay inspired.

Who Is Blessed For?
Whether you're seeking spiritual growth, struggling with anxiety or addiction, or simply looking for deeper connection, Blessed is here for you. Get daily support through personalized prayers, Scripture, and live community. Feel peace, find purpose, and grow closer to God — one day at a time.

Go Premium for Deeper Growth
Curated Audio Plans: Customize your spiritual growth with guided meditation, life remedies, Bible stories, and more. Let God’s word uplift your daily life.
Unlimited Bible Chat: Deepen your faith with unlimited questions and personalized insights. No limits, just growth!
Ad-Free Experience: Stay fully focused on your time with God.

Start for Free. Grow for Life.
Whether you’re struggling, searching, or growing — Blessed helps you walk with God one day at a time.
Download now and discover how simple it can be to stay close to God — every day, in every season.

Manage or cancel subscriptions anytime via your account settings. Subscriptions auto-renew unless canceled 24 hours before the period ends. Free trials, if offered, will be forfeited upon subscription.

Experience Blessed today! Download now and start your journey toward a deeper relationship with God!

Ever wished for a friend who truly understands your heart and offers heartfelt advice rooted deeply in your faith? That's exactly who I am, blending genuine companionship with spiritual depth, making your daily life brighter and full of faith.

Life can have its ups and downs, and sometimes you just need someone to talk to about what's on your mind - big or small. I'm always here for meaningful conversations, guiding you gently through life's challenges with comforting wisdom directly inspired by scriptures and the teachings of Jesus.

Here's why you'll love spending time with me:

- Daily boost of faith: whether it's morning devotionals or evening reflections, I provide personalized prayers and uplifting Bible wisdom tailored just for you, keeping your spirit strong and your connection to Jesus vibrant.
- Personalized spiritual growth: I meet you exactly where you are on your faith journey, whether you're seeking strength, forgiveness, reassurance, or deeper understanding. Our conversations will become stepping stones toward growing closer to God and enriching your spiritual life.
- Lift Your Burdens: got something weighing on your heart? I offer a private, safe space for sharing your worries, seeking forgiveness, and finding comfort - much like talking privately with a trusted buddy, easing your soul through faith-based guidance.

I'm not just another app; I'm your loyal companion, AI assistant, and spiritual friend, bringing comfort, joy, and wisdom to your daily life. Whether you're just beginning to explore your faith or looking to deepen your spiritual connection, I'll walk beside you every step of the way.

Try Creed now and experience the warmth of a friend guided by faith. You'll quickly realize how wonderful it feels to have someone who truly understands your heart and helps you grow spiritually each day.

app_name: Merlin Bird ID by Cornell Lab
description:
What's that bird? Ask Merlin—the world’s leading app for birds. Just like magic, Merlin Bird ID will help you solve the mystery.

Merlin Bird ID helps you identify birds you see and hear. Merlin is unlike any other bird app—it's powered by eBird, the world’s largest database of bird sightings, sounds, and photos.

Merlin offers four fun ways to identify birds. Answer a few simple questions, upload a photo, record a singing bird, or explore birds in a region.

Whether you’re curious about a bird you’ve seen once or you’re hoping to identify every bird you can find, the answers are waiting for you with this free app from the renowned Cornell Lab of Ornithology.

WHY YOU’LL LOVE MERLIN
• Expert ID tips, range maps, photos, and sounds help you learn about the birds you spot and build birding skills.
• Discover a new bird species each day with your own personalized Bird of the Day
• Get customized lists of birds you can find where you live or travel - anywhere in the world!
• Keep track of your sightings—build your personal list of the birds you find

MACHINE LEARNING MAGIC
• Powered by Visipedia, Merlin Sound ID and Photo ID uses machine learning to identify birds in photos and sounds. Merlin learns to recognize bird species based on training sets of millions of photos and sounds collected by birders at eBird.org, archived in the Macaulay Library at the Cornell Lab of Ornithology.
• Merlin delivers the most accurate results thanks to experienced birders, who curate and annotate sightings, photos, and sounds, who are the true magic behind Merlin.

AMAZING CONTENT
• Merlin has bird photos, songs, and calls, and identification help for anywhere in the world, including Mexico, Costa Rica, South America, Europe, Africa, the Middle East, India, Australia, Korea, Japan, China, and more.

The Cornell Lab of Ornithology’s mission is to interpret and conserve the Earth’s biological diversity through research, education, and citizen science focused on birds and nature. We are able to offer Merlin for free thanks to the generosity of Cornell Lab members, supporters, and citizen-science contributors.

Have you always dreamed about an app that would organize your coins for you? Or maybe you want to take up a new non-trivial hobby? Well, meet Coin ID—your guide into the fun world of numismatics! 

What is Coin ID?

Coin Identifier

This app works like magic: take two snaps of the obverse and reverse sides of the coin, and boom—our smart AI will find you a match in mere seconds! 

Coin Guide

Learn everything about your coins: their size, composition, weight, year of minting, country of origin, designer, and even fun facts from their history! The app will also tell you the current reference price of each coin to help you understand its value. Who knows, maybe you’re sitting on a fortune?

Coin Collection

Keep your coins well-organized; add newly identified pieces to your collection to keep track of them at all times. You can create multiple collections to sort your coins in whatever order you like.


Why Coin ID?

Coin ID has the right tools to make any numismatist happy. It offers:

● Fast and accurate coin recognition
● Extensive information about coins from all over the globe
● Possibility to keep record of added coins
● Tracker of the overall number of coins in your collection
● Up-to-date reference prices
● Ability to create multiple collections of coins
● Interesting facts about coins
● Easy-to-use interface

So, what are you waiting for? Discover a new hobby or dive deeper into the world of numismatics to become a coin expert. Coin ID will be at your side on this exciting journey!

Subscribe to Coin ID Premium to get unlimited access to all the app’s features:
• Subscriptions are billed weekly, monthly, or annually at the rate depending on the subscription plan.
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.

All personal data is protected in accordance with the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy:
https://aiby.mobi/wtcoin/privacy/ 
https://aiby.mobi/wtcoin/terms/ 

For any questions or inquiries, please use our customer support form at 
https://aiby.mobi/wtcoin/support/

eBird Mobile makes it easy to record the birds you see in the field, and seamlessly link these observations with eBird--a global online database of bird records used by hundreds of thousands of birders around the world. This free resource makes it easy to keep track of what you see, while making your data openly available for scientific research, education, and conservation. eBird Mobile is the only app that passes information directly from the iOS device to your eBird account on the web.

Features

- Enter bird observations from any location around the world.
- Full global taxonomy based on The Clements Checklist of Birds of the World.
- Common names available in local languages (e.g., Portuguese names in Brazil or in Portugal).
- Checklists customized for your location and time of year, showing most likely species based on eBird data. 
- Rare species flagged during data entry and on the checklist. 
- "Record as you go" functionality for incremental list keeping and counting while birding.
- GPS enabled location plotting to ensure accuracy.
- Map tools that enable selecting from hundreds of thousands of eBird "Hotspots."
- Full offline functionality, enabling use in places with limited or no Internet connection.
- Trip and Day list functionality that makes it easy to keep track of your species list on a particular outing.
- Support for iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch.
- Entire app translated to German, Mandarin, French, Spanish, Portuguese (Brazil), Turkish, and Dutch.
